languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, этот контейнер как целый состав весит. Может, вам будет угодно воспользоваться грузовым краном?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, этот контейнер как целый состав весит. Может, вам будет угодно воспользоваться грузовым краном?"

languages.text: "Lord Captain, this container weighs as much as a whole train. Perhaps you'd like to use the cargo crane?"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, este contenedor pesa más que un vagón de tren. ¿No preferiría utilizar la grúa de estiba?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this container weighs as much as a whole train. Perhaps you'd like to use the cargo crane?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, este contenedor pesa más que un vagón de tren. ¿No preferiría utilizar la grúa de estiba?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、このコンテナは列車1台分の重さがあります。貨物クレーンをお使いになりますか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this container weighs as much as a whole train. Perhaps you'd like to use the cargo crane?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、このコンテナは列車1台分の重さがあります。貨物クレーンをお使いになりますか？」

languages.text: “舰长大人，这个集装箱就像一整列火车一样重，不如用起重机试试吧？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this container weighs as much as a whole train. Perhaps you'd like to use the cargo crane?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这个集装箱就像一整列火车一样重，不如用起重机试试吧？”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, dieser Container wiegt so viel wie der ganze Zug. Vielleicht solltet Ihr es mit einem Frachtkran versuchen?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this container weighs as much as a whole train. Perhaps you'd like to use the cargo crane?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, dieser Container wiegt so viel wie der ganze Zug. Vielleicht solltet Ihr es mit einem Frachtkran versuchen?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ce conteneur pèse aussi lourd qu'un train tout entier. La grue de chargement vous faciliterait grandement la tâche. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this container weighs as much as a whole train. Perhaps you'd like to use the cargo crane?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, ce conteneur pèse aussi lourd qu'un train tout entier. La grue de chargement vous faciliterait grandement la tâche. »

languages.text: "Bu konteyner, koskoca trenler kadar ağır Lord Kaptan. Kargo vincini kullanmak ister miydiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this container weighs as much as a whole train. Perhaps you'd like to use the cargo crane?"
